entities.name: helena ravenclaw
entities.description: Helena Ravenclaw is the daughter of Rowena Ravenclaw and the one who stole the diadem. She is described as seeking to make herself cleverer and more important than her mother.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Flitwick is a person who would have been asked by Helena if she knew anything about the diadem.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who would have been asked by Helena if she knew anything about the diadem.

entities.name: rowena ravenclaw
entities.description: Rowena Ravenclaw is Helena's mother and the one from whom the diadem was stolen.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person who is listening to Helena's confession.

relationships.description: Helena stole the diadem from her mother, Rowena Ravenclaw.
